issue.message: The layout "activity_main" in layout-television has no declaration in the base layout folder; this can lead to crashes when the resource is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
issue.explanation:
If a resource is only defined in folders with resource qualifiers, it might crash your app on devices where the resource is not found for the current configuration.
For example, if you define a layout only in `layout-sw600dp`, and a tablet in landscape mode tries to inflate that layout, it will crash because it will not be found for that specific configuration.
In this case, you should also define a default version of the resource in the base resource folder.
